name: Parking Ticket C64
description:
Welcome to Parking Ticket, 

a mix of Snake and Match 4. 

In this game, you have to get cars of the same colors close to each other to get points. 4 in a line or 4 in a square will get you one step closer to the high score!

I wish you a lot of fun with my first C64 game which is also a demake of my first published game. :0D

Controls:
Up / Down / Left / Right for changing the driving direction
Space for faster driving
Hitting an obstacle / the playground borders for parking cars
